H2.text: what countries have spanish as the national language. Colombia

H3.text: what countries have spanish as the national language. Spain

A4.text: Spanish—featured in the 1978 Spanish Constitution as castellano ('Castilian')—has effectively been the official language of the entire country since 1931.

A5.text: the Spanish language is spoken by more than 600 million Hispanophones, making it the world's second-most spoken native language and the world's most widely spoken Romance language.
